name: 利迪娅·杜达
awards: 2023年 第47届香港国际电影节 纪录片竞赛 火鸟大奖 (提名) 雏鸟
introduction: Lidia Duda (1958). Polish director and scriptwriter,makes reportage, films and documentary series.She obtained a degree in Culture Studies from Wrocław University. She has made many films broadcast by the Polish television and directed and written scripts to a number of important documents including Tu wódka jest Bogiem, a wiara nałogiem (2001), Nie zgadzam się na świat, w którym żyją moi bohaterowie (2002), U nas w Pietraszach (2002), Hercules (2004), and documentary series such as Tylko tato and Młode rekiny. Her films have won many festival awards.Filmography: 2006 - What do you see when closing your eyes - directing, script writing; 2005 - Hercules ventures into the world - directing, script writing; 2004/05 -Young sharks - directing, script writing; 2004 - Hercules - directing; 2003 - My brother, welcome in the gypsy camp- directing, script writing; 2003 -There is only dad - directing 2003 - Aquarium- directing - script writing; 2002 - Here, in Pietrasze – directing2002 - I don't agree for the world where my characters have to live - directing, scriptwriting; 2001 - Where vodka is like God and the faith is an addiction- directing; 2001 - Dark side of the city – realization.
